answers.answer: Hi Jennifer.You sound very motivated and I wish you the best of luck reaching your goals.How long does your fast last for and what do you start eating when it's finished?

question: Hi everyone, I'm Jennifer and am new to the Community.  I look forward the journey with you guys to meet our weight goals.  I'm around 220 now.  I'm 37, 5'4". Have been as high as 225.  I was 130 in high school and NEVER skinny.  In college I weighed around 140-150.  My weight has yo-yo'd through getting married, sedentary job, 3 kids and a divorce.  Divorce and South Beach were my biggest successes.  I lost about 50 lbs that way.  I got down to 175 which is the lowest I've been in the past 10 years.I just started Dr. Bartels weight management program and am on the full fast (nutrition shakes & vitamins are taken, just no real food).  My mom is and has always been overweight.  She has comorbities: Type II Diabetes, Sleep apnea and pulmonary issues.  I want to lose weight to improve my health, for my own self-esteem, to keep my fiance, and to be able to more fully enjoy my kids and make sure I am around for them.I wish all of you success in your journey. :)
title: New to the Community
